alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 06 at 8:38AM AKDT until August 06 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR EASTERN ALASKA RANGE... * AFFECTED AREA...Eastern Alaska Range. * TIMING...Until 10 PM AKDT this evening. * WINDS...Southeast 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph. Winds strongest near passes. * HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the upper 70s. * IMPACTS...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
